welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Paz, Uruguay! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that La Paz has to offer."

restaurants.name: Panadería Beneite
restaurants.description: Panadería Beneite is a bakery located in Argentina, Mendoza.
restaurants.address: Independencia (Av. San Martin), 5590 Argentina, Mendoza, Mendoza, La Paz

restaurants.name: DejaVu
restaurants.description: DejaVu is a american restaurant located in La Paz.

restaurants.name: Parador La Paz
restaurants.description: Parador La Paz is a sandwich spot located in La Paz.
restaurants.address: Av. 25 De Mayo (Sarmiento), 5590 La Paz, Mendoza

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Carrasco International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Carrasco International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
